author: Zack Budryk
title: China directs new research into origins of coronavirus to be 'tightly managed:' report
description: Chinese officials have reportedly announced new limits on academic publications investigating the origins of the coronavirus, according to a since-removed online notice published by two Chinese universities.The pol...
content:
Chinese officials have reportedly announced new limits on academic publications investigating the origins of the coronavirus, according to a since-removed online notice published by two Chinese universities.
The policy imposes new, more stringent vetting on … [+1773 chars]
